description:
Create a real world django application using current best practices. We will show you how to organize a django project for reusability, demonstrate how virtualenv can provide an encapsulated and portable development environment. We will spend some time digging into some powerful django features that get little or no exposure in most tutorials. Along with the demonstration application, we will give a brief overview of the pinax framework.

Our demonstration application will implement:    • An authentication system using django generic views.
   • Ajax autocomplete.
   • Tagging using django-tagging.
   • A lightweight custom search using the tagging application.
   • Threaded comments using django-threadedcomments.
title: Next Level Django
